wikipedia_page.main: Peter Andrew Waterman (born 26 March 1961) is a former English cricketer. Waterman was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium-fast. He was born at Hendon, Middlesex.

response: Peter Waterman (8 December 1934 – 16 January 1986) was an English boxer and a British and European welterweight champion.
